publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4891 Brian Adam: Haudagain Roundabout, Aberdeen—That the Parliament notes that the Audit Scotland report, Scottish Executive: an overview of the performance of transport in Scotland, once again highlights the inadequacy of the Haudagain roundabout in Aberdeen and calls on the Scottish Executive to take cognisance of the report, to take radical action to improve traffic flow at this pinch point and to dual Mugiemoss Road, Persley Bridge and the Parkway.

S2M-4891 Brian Adam: Haudagain Roundabout, Aberdeen—That the Parliament notes that the Audit Scotland report, Scottish Executive: an overview of the performance of transport in Scotland, once again highlights the inadequacy of the Haudagain roundabout in Aberdeen and calls on the Scottish Executive to take cognisance of the report, to take radical action to improve traffic flow at this pinch point and to dual Mugiemoss Road, Persley Bridge and the Parkway. Supported by: Derek Brownlee*
S2M-4891 Haudagain Roundabout, Aberdeen (lodged on 28 September 2006) Mr David Davidson*, John Swinburne*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4891 Haudagain Roundabout, Aberdeen (lodged on 28 September 2006) Dave Petrie*
S2M-4891 Haudagain Roundabout, Aberdeen (lodged on 28 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
